full_summary:
# High-Profile 100W PEMFC Test Station

**Announcement Title**
High-Profile 100W PEMFC Test Station
**Notice Reference Number**: cb-251-8268519
**Publication Date**: 2023-10-17
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-27
**Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-11-30
**Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-29

## Description of Requirements

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is seeking a contractor to provide a High-Profile 100W Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cell (PEMFC) Test Station. The delivery location is at the NRC's Vancouver branch, located at 4250 Westbrook Mall, Vancouver, BC V6T 1W5, Canada.

The test station must consist of the following features:

* A fully-integrated Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy (EIS) system (Gamry Interface 5000E)
* Cyclic and Linear Voltammetry capabilities
* Online water conductivity meter
* Consumables Kit

## Tender Details

* Tender method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Procurement category: Goods and Services
* Contracting entity: National Research Council of Canada
* End user entities: National Research Council of Canada
* Contact person: Cindy Marshall (cindy.marshall@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)

## Tender Attachment

The tender includes the following attachments:

* Solicitation amendment 004: Revision to Annex B – Basis of Payment
* Solicitation amendment 005: Revision to Annex B – Basis of Payment
* RFP: High-Profile 100 W PEMFC Test Stations (English)
* RFP: High-Profile 100 W PEMFC Test Stations (French)
* Questions and Answers (English)
* Questions and Answers (French)

## Notice of Clarification and Amendment

Notice is hereby given that the closing date for the reception of tenders is extended to Monday, November 27, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. EST. 

Enquiries regarding this tender must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority no later than five (5) calendar days before the bid closing date. Enquiries received after that time may not be answered.

Please note that this tender has expired. Any subsequent tenders will not be considered.
